Sentencas: Nano-structured polycrystalline CeO2 is proposed to be used as a candidate electrolyte material for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) operating at temperatures <= 600 degrees C.
Titulo: Enhanced oxygen diffusion in nano-structured ceria

Sentencas: Here we show that in this material the diffusion activation energy of oxygen ions is 0.35 eV.
Titulo: Enhanced oxygen diffusion in nano-structured ceria

Sentencas: The diffusion mechanism corresponds to the single-file diffusion mechanism, associated with the presence of one-dimensional channels in the anion sublattice of CeO2.
Titulo: Enhanced oxygen diffusion in nano-structured ceria

Sentencas: The small grain size of the material approximate to 10 nm, as well as its stoichiometric state (Ce2O3), minimize the contribution of the electronic and polaron components of the electrical conductivity of this material, which also contribute to the optimization of SOFC operation.
Titulo: Enhanced oxygen diffusion in nano-structured ceria
